cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("csv")

	CSV("dst", "src.field").QUOTE(`"`).EMPTY_VALUE("-").TRIM(true)

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: csv
processors:
  - csv:
      tag: csv_src_field_into_dst_dc42d800
      field: src.field
      target_field: dst
      quote: '"'
      trim: true
